availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Hickman County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Elizabeth Mattingly Hayden in Washington County, Kentucky, on October 13, 1827. Father of R.P. Hayden, Mary A. Hayden, S.W. Hayden, Henry Hayden, E.A. Hayden, Joseph Lee Hayden, Samuel W. Hayden, William S. Hayden, and Sallie Hayden. Farmer in Hickman County, Kentucky, in 1850. Farmer in Hickman County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Hickman County, p. 37B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Hickman County, Hays, p. 537.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Washington County Marriages, Film 000551244, p. 59.
"William James Hayden (1805-1878)," Find A Grave, Memorial 25949052, accessed January 18, 2023, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/25949052.
